item.title: A Complete Unknown Costume Designer Reveals How Walk The Line Prepared Her To Tackle Bob Dylan
item.description: Costume Designer Arianne Phillips discusses the challenges she faced when recreating the looks from real events in James Mangold's A Complete Unknown.

item.title: Glen Powell: Net Worth, Age, Height & Everything You Need To Know About The A-List Star
item.description: Glen Powell is one of the biggest movie stars at the moment but surprisingly, his net worth is not as high as one might expect from the actor.

item.title: This Underrated 82% RT Horror Movie Starring DC & Game Of Thrones Actors Was The Best Kept Secret Of The 2000s
item.description: Dog Soldiers is one of the most creative and innovative horror movies of the 2000s, but it never gets the recognition that it deserves.
